name: A Dream A Day
description:
Made For The Mini Jam - 105

Theme : Dreamy, Limitation: Every Playthrough is Unique

Every time you start the game, you have a chance of playing 1 of 3 dreams which all have a unique ending to them :)

No SFX as of now, because I didn't have time, only BG music...

Some of the dreams might be based of RNG, I'm sorry for this but I didn't have time to implement proper a "Spawning System"

- Controls -

Only 'Arrow Keys'/'WASD' or 'Mouse Input'

Good Luck and Have Fun!
